description.brief: Third-party KNI library for Katana arms

package.description:
This package provides the third-party KNI (Katana Native Interface) library for Katana robot arms.
Instead of using the KNI library directly, the katana package should be used for communication with the Katana arm.
package.author: Neuronics AG (see AUTHORS.txt); ROS wrapper by Martin GÃ¼nther
